articles.description: The federal government has dropped charges against Jonathan Augustine, a former AAU basketball director from Florida, in the Adidas scandal case.
articles.headline: Feds drop charges against AAU basketball program director in Adidas scandal case

images.caption: Charges were dropped for a man accused of helping Adidas funnel money to families of high-ranked basketball recruits.
images.name: Adidas logo [600x400]

articles.description: Will Curry's incredible shooting become the new normal for more guards like the OU star? Kevin Pelton examines what Young shows about the NBA MVP's effect on future draft prospects.
articles.headline: Is Trae Young just the first of many Steph Curry clones?

images.caption: Oklahoma's breakout star Trae Young joins SC6 and says that he emulates different styles of players like Steph Curry and Steve Nash.
images.name: OU's Young has a fan in Curry

articles.description: The NCAA tournament selection committee released its initial top 16 seeds this weekend, which gave Bubble Watch a chance to clear a few teams off the bubble and into lock status.
articles.headline: Bubble Watch: Let's hand out some locks

images.name: Duke vs. North Carolina (Theo Pinson #1 of the North Carolina Tar Heels dunks the ball) [608x342]

articles.description: Trae Young's sudden struggle is the biggest question in the Big 12. In the SEC, it's a daily struggle for Kentucky. As March approaches, each league has some big things to figure out over the next two weeks.
articles.headline: The most important things as conference play winds down

images.caption: This has not been an easy year for John Calipari and Kentucky.
images.name: Kentucky [608x342]

articles.description: It wasn't that long ago that Pitt was an NCAA tournament mainstay. Now, the Panthers are 0-13 in the ACC. Kevin Stallings thinks he can turn things around, but will he even get the chance?
articles.headline: What happened to Pitt basketball?

images.caption: Things are a mess at Pittsburgh. Is coach Kevin Stallings' run ending?
images.name: Kevin Stallings [1296x864]

articles.description: With both teams heading into the game looking for a much needed win, Baylor's Jo Lual-Acuil Jr. slams home the go-ahead dunk with 10 seconds left in double overtime to give the Bears a 74-73 victory.
articles.headline: Baylor edges Texas in 2OT thriller

images.caption: With both teams heading into the game looking for a much needed win, Baylor's Jo Lual-Acuil Jr. slams home the go-ahead dunk with 10 seconds left in double overtime to give the Bears a 74-73 victory.
images.name: Baylor edges Texas in 2OT thriller
